# <a name="keyboard-shortcuts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="f9b4d-102">Atalhos de teclado no Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f9b4d-102">Keyboard shortcuts in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f9b4d-103">No Outlook.com, você pode usar os mesmos atalhos de teclado que o serviço de email com o qual você está acostumado a trabalhar, como Gmail, Yahoo mail ou Outlook.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f9b4d-103">In Outlook.com you can use the same keyboard shortcuts as the email service you're used to working with, such as Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or Outlook.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f9b4d-104">Vá para [configurações de acessibilidade](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f9b4d-104">Go to [Accessibility settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="f9b4d-105">**Settings**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f9b4d-105">**Settings**</span></span> 
 > <span data-ttu-id="f9b4d-106">**Exibir todas as configurações** > do Outlook**acessibilidade\*\*\*\*geral** > ) e escolher quais atalhos de teclado você gostaria de usar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f9b4d-106">**View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Accessibility**) and choose which keyboard shortcuts you'd like use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f9b4d-107">Para ver a lista completa de atalhos de teclado, consulte [atalhos de teclado do Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f9b4d-107">To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, see [Outlook.com keyboard shortcuts](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
